price: And [remember] Ishmael, Idrīs and Dhul-Kifl[37]; they were all steadfast.
arabic: وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِدۡرِيسَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ كُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
